title: Yes, teenagers account for 10% of deliveries in South Africa, but not half the maternal deaths
subtitle: One in 10 births are to teenagers, but almost half the childbirth deaths are of teen moms, says the head of the KwaZulu-Natal health department. Is he correct?
author: africacheck.org
